messages.message:
During @Tom Deaney’s Demo enablement on just now, going from Run > Build > Converse - I noticed there’s really no obvious way to know which part of Aihub we’re in. All three UI’s where the majority of the demo is spent look very similar.

I wonder if for first time viewers Or new users, there should there be an easier way to tell where you are in platform?
I wish they were all just one.  Add multi-doc to build and they really become one.  Also would love to be able to save multi-doc conversations as a built app
PFR from a while back on this: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1688
